CustomField.description: HYPERLINK("/setup/ui/recordtypeselect.jsp?ent=Opportunity&retURL=" + Id + "&save_new_url=" + "%2F006%2Fe%3Flookupcmpgn%3D1%26retURL%3D%252F" + Id + "%26accid=" + AccountId + "&conid=" + Id + "&opp3=" + FirstName + " -Donation " + Text(Today()) + "&CF00NU0000003iNhs=" + FirstName + LastName + "&CF00NU0000003iNhs_lkid=" + Id , IMAGE("/resource/QuickActions/Money.png","New Opp") , "_parent")
CustomField.label: New Opportunity
